stories.text: I've been a software engineer for over 20 years and looking into day trading. Are there advantages and/or resources specifically targeted to software engineers who also trade?
stories.title: Ask HN: Are there advantages for a software engineer looking to day trade?

stories.text:
It is highlighted that over time, Bitcoin could act as an independent store of value—like gold is now. Both have a limited supply, but Bitcoin is easier to transact with and open to anyone. 
If this is the case, then what would happen to the value of gold? It’s total market cap is around [$11 Trillion](https://companiesmarketcap.com/gold/marketcap/). A lot of this is used for jewelry, but it seems like the gold that’s used for financial trading could go out of circulation.
stories.title: What happens to the price of gold if BTC becomes “digital gold”?
Former Lord and Taylor department stores to be made into labs

stories.text: There is a voltage readout, so is there a simple utility that will record how many wH / day my Macbook uses?
stories.title: Ask HN: How can I get data on watt-hours power use per day from my MacBook?
